overview: Ben is a farm boy who comes into conflict with the Evil Spanish Governor and his two sons. To assist in their oppression the Governor hires a Samurai to teach his son the Japanese Katana sword. To counter this, Ben studies under a blind Franciscan monk to obtain some advanced fighting secrets and develop his warrior senses. Additionally Ben must search for the legendary “Iron Reed”. A mystical stick so strong that grows in the lava of an active Volcano.
tagline: Roland Dantes, Foremost Exponent of Arnis, the Martial Art of Stick Fighting Will Thrill You With His Proficiency and Speed in the Deadly Art of Arnis!
title: The Pacific Connection
